trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Ottawa
There were no other sightings in Ottawa on or around December 13th 2001
divs: Sighting Details FIRST (10)SECONDS3E3E Observed (3) white lights in the sky in the south end of the city3E travelling in a triangular formation evenly spaced3E 1st(top of the triangle) light stopped instantly letting the other3E two pass (both travelling at seperate speeds)3E 1st light then moves from a standing stop to a quick right turn3E 2nd light (bottom left of the triangle) slows letting 3rd pass3E 3rd light (bottom right of the triangle) speeds up passing 2nd3E 1st light moves very quickly left and behind the 3rd3E 2nd light zooms beside the 1st formming an off shaped triangle3E3E LAST 3 TO 5 SECONDS3E3E 1st and 3rd light veer to the east3E 2nd light continues south3E3E ALL VANISH3E3E these lights were travelling to fast and to close to be planes or helicopters3E their manuvers were to smooth and abrupt3E and they all consisted of one (1) singular non flashing light3E
